meanings.definition: A type of Chinese porcelain with a mottled pink and white glaze.
meanings.sent1: The antique shop displayed a beautiful peachblows vase.
meanings.sent2: She loved the soft hues of peachblows in her room decor.
meanings.sent3: The peachblows teapot blushed when it accidentally chipped.
meanings.sent4: The sky at sunset resembled a vast peachblows bowl.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of peachblows in his painting.

meanings.definition: A pale pink color resembling that of a peachblow.
meanings.sent1: Her dress was a lovely shade of peachblows.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden bloomed in various shades, including peachblows.
meanings.sent3: The sunset painted the sky in a soft peachblows hue.
meanings.sent4: The morning sky blushed with a peachblows tint.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated in calming peachblows tones.

meanings.definition: To blush or turn pink in color.
meanings.sent1: She peachblowsed when he complimented her outfit.
meanings.sent2: The child's cheeks peachblowsed after running around in the cold.
meanings.sent3: The flowers seemed to peachblows in the warmth of the sun.
meanings.sent4: The sky peachblowsed as the sun dipped below the horizon.
meanings.sent5: His face peachblowsed with embarrassment when he tripped.
